#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#define emp 2147483647

using namespace std;

int a[102][102];
int n, m;

int rec(int i, int j)
{
    if(a[i+1][j] == emp && a[i][j+1] == emp)return 0;
    if(a[i+1][j] < a[i][j+1])
    {
        a[i][j] = a[i+1][j];
        a[i+1][j] = emp;
        return (1 + rec(i+1, j));
    }
    else
    {
        a[i][j] = a[i][j+1];
        a[i][j+1] = emp;
        return (1 + rec(i, j+1));
    }

}


int main()
{
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while(t--)
    {

        cin >> n >> m;
        for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
        {
            for(int j = 1; j <= m; j++)cin >> a[i][j];
        }
        for(int i = 1; i <= n+1; i++)a[i][m+1] = emp;
        for(int i = 1; i <= m+1; i++)a[n+1][i] = emp;

        /*for(int i = 1; i <= n+1; i++)
        {
            for(int j = 1; j <= m+1; j++)cout << a[i][j] << " ";cout << endl;
        }*/


        //int ix = 1, jx = 1;
        cout << rec(1, 1) << endl;



    }

}
